bioconda.name: bioconductor-ebimage
bioconda.summary: Image processing and analysis toolbox for R

biotools.summary: R package which provides general purpose functionality for image processing and analysis. In the context of (high-throughput) microscopy-based cellular assays, It offers tools to segment cells and extract quantitative cellular descriptors. This allows the automation of such tasks using the R programming language and facilitates the use of other tools in the R environment for signal processing, statistical modeling, machine learning and visualization with image data.
